title: An Act establishing a sick leave bank for Richard Curley, an employee of the Middlesex Sheriff’s Office

abstracts.abstract: By Representative Sena of Acton, a petition (subject to Joint Rule 12) of Danillo A. Sena for legislation to establish a sick leave bank for Richard Curley, an employee of the Middlesex Sheriff’s Office.  Public Service.

actions.description: Referred to the committee on House Rules
